snippet.title: PSX Longplay [080] Ace Combat 2 (part 1 of 2)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Deskawa

This is the sequel to Air/Ace Combat, which includes a new mission structure and special enemy pilots that must be killed so it takes longer to beat the game. Other than that, the graphics are improved (they did a great work with textures) and the music gets more sophisticated with a more electronic sound.

I probably did something strange with the structure of the walkthrough. I included the basic part (with the normal ending) in the first part, and I left the extra missions and the last ones (that lead you to the good ending) for the second part. In the second part, missions 11 and 19 are with an asterisc since I missed one of the special pilots, one time because of the incorrect info in the guide I used, and the second time on porpouse, so I could get the normal ending. Anyway, my recommendation is to just watch those missions in part 1 and skip them in the part 2, as they take more time to beat.

PART 1

Mission 1 - 04:14
Mission 2 - 07:41
Mission 3 - 11:38
Mission 4 - 16:14
Mission 5 - 20:23
Mission 6 - 27:33
Mission 7 - 33:44
Mission 8 - 37:03
Mission 9 - 41:47
Mission 10 - 47:46
Mission 11 - 51:51
Mission 12 - 56:33
Mission 13 - 1:04:11
Mission 14 - 1:11:42
Mission 15 - 1:19:59
Mission 16 - 1:25:00
Mission 17 - 1:28:47
Mission 18 - 1:34:31
Mission 19 - 1:41:27 -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
